summary: A collection of unit tests that verify GuardDuty management features, including detector CRUD operations, filter handling, organization admin account actions, and server creation behavior, all using mocked AWS services via Moto.
business_intent: Validate that the GuardDuty integration functions correctly and remains reliable by testing core operations such as creating, updating, retrieving, listing, and deleting detectors and filters, as well as managing organization admin accounts and server configuration.
